tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was tested positive for COVID with being asymptomatic. Was alright and had no discomforts. The corporation office guys were like hounds behind me to get admitted in Govt hospital.
With medication and isolation I am fit for a home quarantine which the corporation was not letting me do.
Madam only checked and gave me consult and after proper screening she gave clearance for home quarantine. 
She is very patient *** ************* *** has a empathetic attitude towards patients. I would totally recommend her to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the most "human" doctor i have ever seen. As in she was not at all "see the report - ask basic questions- prescribe medicines" type. I took blood tests and was worried about my extreme fatigue and sweating fearing if it was related to some heart disease. She gave me enough time to tell bout my medical history and personal routine and life style and listened patiently. Then explained every single deviation is the reports so clearly and conveyed that am perfectly fine and just have to eat healthy and do regular exercises and made me feel happy and relaxed. She also suggested another doctor for my anxiety. Thank you so much Dr. Kavitha.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I highly disappointed with the service by Doctor...she was in very hurry burry mode. she dint give proper consultation even I have raised few questions..I don't recommend this doctor anymore.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My first time HB1AC was 9.7. i have consulted with the doctor , without being seen complete lab test reports doctor advised to follow the medicine for diabetics. Later on i discuss with other doctors and just made small life style improvement without taking medication in 3 months time HB1AC down to 6.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Kavitha is very kind and patient. she is patient enough to get to know the patient's sickness and history. I came in consultation for my 82-yr old grand mother for shingles(akki). We went on in consultation with many general physicians and her case was getting worse rather than getting better. *** ********* *** **** ******* *** ** *** ****** My grandmother was almost back to normal in just 2-3 weeks when many said it would take atleast 4-6 months for cure. We were completely satisfied with her dignosis  and the way she treated us.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable and wonderful feedback.Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Dr Kavitha was kind, reassuring and confidently diagnosed Covid symptoms and asked for test right away.  Her assessment was right. Highly recommend her for those who are unable to move out of house when sick. I am recovering now and take the opportunity to thank her!

Thank you for your feedback

First day consultation was to control the infection and to suggest test for evaluation.
Next consultation is to interpret,review and then give advice accordingly.
One fee is not annual maintainence.
It's the professional time spent on behalf of the client.
Two different sessions,two different diagnosis and  treatment for two different conditions.

Can you get any lab test repeated again and not pay for it.
You can use your brilliant imagination to apply this to as many situations as you can.

Take care
